projects.name: TwoEasyEngine
projects.startDate: Wed Oct 15 2025 17:20:32 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time)
projects.description: TwoEasyEngine is a lightweight 2D rendering library built on HTML5 Canvas. It provides a clean, object-oriented API for creating interactive scenes, managing meshes, controlling cameras, and animating objects, with minimal setup.
